FuncDef:
The threshold rtd command sets thresholds for the round-trip delay of a Trace test type instance.
The undo threshold rtd command deletes the thresholds. The threshold rtd command sets thresholds for the round-trip delay of a Trace test type instance. The undo threshold rtd command deletes the thresholds. By default, no threshold is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the threshold for a round-trip delay.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 60000.

ExtraInfo:
To set delay thresholds after NQA is configured, run the threshold rtd command.
